ai.summary: A 5 km easy loop around the Belfast Castle Estate in the UK, combining parkland, woodlands, and castle grounds for a relaxed day hike suitable for families and casual walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: The trail is mostly flat to gently rolling with well-maintained gravel and compacted dirt paths. Expect some uneven sections and small stairs near the castle area, with scenic views over the surrounding landscape.
ai.safety_notes: Check local conditions before you go. Stay on marked trails; surfaces can be uneven or muddy after rain. Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Bring water and snacks; keep children and pets under close supervision. Be mindful of other users and seasonal closures.
recommended_gear: Map, printed or offline GPS, or a charged phone
ai.best_seasons: All year round; spring and autumn offer especially pleasant conditions and scenery.

seo.title: Belfast Castle Estate Trail – 5 km Easy Walk Near Belfast Castle Grounds
seo.meta_description: Explore the 5 km Belfast Castle Estate Trail, an easy, family-friendly loop through parkland and woodland around Belfast Castle in the UK. Suitable for all ages.
seo.h1: Belfast Castle Estate Trail — 5 km Easy Loop
